title: Rani Haar Pendant - Exquisite Polki & Ruby Tassel Necklace
features: This striking pendant features a central Polki diamond flower motif, surrounded by smaller Polki diamonds set in a closed setting (kundan style). The lower portion boasts a delicate ruby and pearl tassel, meticulously handcrafted. The gold chain is adorned with interspersed ruby and pearl beads, reflecting traditional South Indian design.
occasions: and formal events. A perfect statement piece for a modern bride with a taste for tradition.
description: This pendant represents a harmonious blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The use of Polki diamonds and natural rubies adds a touch of regal elegance, making it a treasured heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster. This is a unique piece that marries traditional Indian aesthetics with modern styling.
